preqs: Must have passed both in MMD1302 and  MMS1402 or both MMD1302 and FIT1012 or DIS1704 or  approval from Course Coordinator

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3115} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MMD1302, MMS1402} OR  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {FIT1012, MMD1302}) Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CDS2001, CDS2002, DIS1704}

description: This unit extends existing knowledge of digital imaging and multimedia design into the production of interactive animation.  Students will understand essential theory and concepts, the range of individual roles, technical skills and resources required for animation production.  Individual exercises lead to the development of projects that explore the representation of gameplay, generative systems and other interactive processes through animation
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
